li.p: Starting in Katalon Studio version 7.0.0, you can use the Selenium-based class EventFiringWebDriver to configure event-driven capabilities related to your WebDrivers for test execution.

conbody.p: This can be used for example when logging steps or triggering certain events before an operation. You can learn more about this class from the Selenium documentation here: EventFiringWebDriver.
In this article, we show you how to handle WebDrivers with the support of EventFiringWebDriver.
